message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think you'll find it's a great investment opportunity. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9,000.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  I'm interested, but  $9,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with.  I'm prepared to pay $8,500 for the product. Let's see if we can find some common ground.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. I can see you're serious about the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9,200. This is the lowest I can go, but I think it's a fair price considering the product's value to you.
Alice, I understand you need to make a profit, but $9,200 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $8,800. This is a fair price that reflects the value to both of us. What do you think?

I appreciate your flexibility, Bob. I can see you're serious about the product. I'm willing to meet you at $9,000, but I need to make a profit. However, I'm willing to throw in some extras to sweeten the deal. I'll include a one-year warranty and a comprehensive support package. This way, you'll get the product and the peace of mind that comes with it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9,000, including the extras.

Alice, I appreciate the extra benefits you're offering. They're definitely valuable. However, I'm still looking for a lower price point.  I'm willing to pay $8,900 for the product, including the warranty and support package. This price is fair and reflects the value we both see in this deal.

I can see you're still interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $9,100, but I need to make a profit. I'll throw in an additional benefit - a 10% discount on any future purchases from me. This way, you'll not only get a great deal on the product, but also a head start on future savings. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9,100, including the warranty, support package, and the discount.

Alice, I'm really interested in the product, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  However, $9,100 is still a bit above what I'm able to pay right now.  I'm willing to offer $8,950 for the product, including the warranty, support package, and the future discount.  This price reflects the value of the deal to both of us, and I believe it's fair and reasonable.

I can see you're really close to making a decision, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $9,050, but I need to make a profit. I'll throw in an additional benefit - a personalized onboarding session to help you get the most out of the product. This way, you'll not only get a great deal on the product, but also expert guidance to ensure a smooth transition. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9,050, including the warranty, support package, future discount, and onboarding session.
